docs.summary: Provides functionality for elements that can contain other elements. Some elements, such as pages, headers, footers, and boxes, can contain other elements. This occurs when you drag an element onto a container element and attach it. These attached elements are considered the parent element's children. Some actions performed on the parent, such as [`hiding`]($w.HiddenMixin.html#hide), will affect the element's children as well.

docs.summary: Gets an array of the elements that are contained within the element.
description: Some elements, such as pages, headers, footers, and boxes, can contain
other elements. This occurs when you drag an element onto a container
These attached elements are considered the parent element's children.

examples.title: Get the children of an element
